channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #ItsViral | A man received a warning from his #manager about
item.description: #ItsViral | A man received a warning from his #manager about leaving work early.

item.title: #WATCH | #SalmanKhan attended an event on August 28 in Mumba
item.description: #WATCH | #SalmanKhan attended an event on August 28 in Mumbai, where he urged the public to opt for eco-friendly Ganpati idols for the upcoming #GanpatiChaturthi.

item.title: #SahibaBali’s recent remark on how people speak English in #
item.description: #SahibaBali’s recent remark on how people speak English in #Bengaluru didn’t sit well with people.
